title: Fully Expandable and Customizable Create Gantry Crop Farm Tutorial | Minecraft Create Mod 1.20

tasks.task: Assembling a Gantry Carriage System for Automated Farming
subtasks: Positioning the Gantry Shaft, noting to leave an empty block at each end to prevent crop uprooting when the carriage reverses direction.
Attaching the Gantry Carriage to the Gantry Shaft and ensuring it can move freely along the length.
Installing redstone contacts on each end of the Gantry Carriage to detect when the carriage reaches the extremities of the farm.
Connecting redstone links between the redstone contacts on the carriage and the receiver, required for signaling the machine to reverse direction.
Configuring the gear shift mechanism using a toggle latch to reverse the rotation direction of the Gantry Shaft via Redstone signals.
Setting up the machine's operational controls, including an on/off switch with a sticky piston and lever for toggling power.
Ensuring the Redstone links are set to a unique frequency to prevent interference with other systems in the game world.
Planting crops in designated areas of the farm, beginning one block past the farthest point of the moving carriage to avoid damage.
Connecting storage and output interfaces (chests, hoppers) to handle harvested crops, including setting up chutes or funnels for efficient unloading.
Activating the Redstone system to initiate movement of the Gantry Carriage along the Shaft, powered by the gear shift mechanism.
Monitoring the system's operation, verifying that the carriage moves back and forth automatically, triggering harvest intervals at the correct intervals.
Adjusting the water wheel's RPM (if applicable) to control the speed of the Gantry Shaft and, consequently, the movement of the harvesters.
Collecting harvested items from the storage chests or retrieving them as needed, ensuring the system's continuous operation.
